body.name: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 1080P Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam Three Way Triple Car Camera with IR Night Vision, Loop Recording, G-Sensor,24H Park Monitor Motion Detection,32GB Card
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 20 mins
features: 【Car Camera with 32G SD Card】2-inch IPS screen car camera with 32GB SD card can work infinitely with a loop recording function. 👉Don't worry that this dash cam will be full of storage space before and after! This driving recorder can realize the simultaneous work of the front camera + the car camera, or the front camera + the rear camera simultaneously. Provide you with more perspectives.

【Three Channel Front Inside Rear Dash Cam】The dashcam built with a triple channel system, offer 150°Front camera, 150°Cabin Inside the camera, and 120°rear camera. Simultaneously captures video from the front, rear, and cabin of your car as vital evidence for dispute or accident.

【Super Infrared Vision】The interior-facing camera with 4 infrared LED lights can handle low light conditions and ensure flawless video footage even when the passenger cabin is dark at night. Equipped with HDR technology, the front camera automatically balances the light and dark areas of the video,Ensure clear recording about road signs, license plate numbers and other important information at night.

【Loop Recording & G Sensor】The dashcam for cars has a loop recording function to continuously record and automatically delete the oldest stored video to record the latest video when the memory is full. When the built-in G-sensor detects a sudden shake/collision, the current video will automatically lock to prevent it from being overwritten. Accident scenes can be truly restored. (32GB memory card included, no separate purchase required).

【24 Hours Parking Monitor】When the dash cam detects a collision, it will automatically turn on and then record a protected video, the collision detection or buffer motion sensor can be triggered by impact or movement, if your vehicle crashed while parked, or If someone tries to steal your vehicle, 24-hour recording

【Purchase with confidence】We want you to know that satisfying our customers is very important to us, as we promised, if customers are not satisfied with our product or have any problems during the use, we could offer a replacement or full refund.So if you have any questions, please contact us first.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside Features: 1.150 °A+ high resolution super wide angle lens,It covers a much wider range of sight giving additional details to the video, provides you important and reliable evidence. 2.1080P Full HD resolution simultaneously capture more details and reduce the blind zone in the recording, keeping you safe and meeting every driver's recording demands. 4.Loop recording overwrites the oldest footage with the newest upon filling a card to capacity, but will skip the emergency locked video (locked files will not be overwritten). 5.2.0 screen provides clearer images and an excellent playback experience.

Front And Inside Dual 1080P Not like other dash cam only has one 1080P resolution camera.The dash cam has front and inside dual channel. Both of them are 1080P resolution. All clear in front and rear. Loop Recording Loop recording automatically overwrites the oldest videos and saves current videos to avoid memory cards getting full. Automatically delete irrelevant records, save important information, and extend memory card space. (32GB memory card is in the package, no need to buy it separately) G-sensor Emergency Lock With the built-in G-sensor, when the car encountered a collision, the video will be blocked, automatically save the video, restore the scene of the accident, to prevent misuse, delete or overwrite， which ensures important footage is kept secure.

24H Parking Monitor The parking monitor function will automatically activates the dash camera and record video when the camera detects shocks or attacks.The car camera also supports 24 hours parking monitor with time lapse mode, can sustain longer operational period while reducing video file size, which greatly save space on the memory card for capturing frames for a long time trip. Superior Starlight Night Vision The car camera - dash cam front and rear equipped with high quality sensor, automatically balance the light and dark areas of the video, this dual dash cam for cars front lens could captures car license clearly even at night or in low-light conditions." Reversing Camera Mode for Safe Parking This dash cameras display screen will automatically show full rear view with parking guide lines when the car reverse gear is engaged. The waterproof rear view camera will help you to park your car easily and safely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am happy I was able to resolve my issue. The camera works great. I am happy with the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work out of the box
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a long drive to a car show. Got it delivered later than usual. Opened the box and proceeded to test it before installing it in the car.When I turned it on, a nice little Pacific Island Beach Scene picture was displayed. That's as far as I got. Nothing else worked. The only button that did anything was the power button. Holding it down for 10 secs turned the camera off, but it turned itself back on immediately.I wasted almost an hour pressing buttons, holding buttons for many many seconds, etc...etc...etc.I finally realized I was wasting my time. Had to run down to the local "W" big box and picked up a comparable camera. Worked fine right out of the box.Return is in process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got everything set up easily! Good quality and the cameras are pretty small! You won’t have to worry about them being a distraction while driving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Backup camera does not work.
reviews.reviewText: Had to return the same day I received it cause the backup camera port is broken on the camera itself. It does record inside and outside but it is very “zoomed in”. Got one from Walmart for $69 and it is much better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has been a beast so far
reviews.reviewText: This has been running a LOT since I got it. Every time I get in the car, both cameras are rolling. The picture quality is good to go, the sound is crystal clear, and it was a breeze to get set up and installed. It came with a 32GB SD card, so I didn't have to provide my own, which I appreciated. You can just leave this on loop recording, and unless you have something noteworthy happen, it will record over the oldest footage once it gets full. If you have something happen that you want to save, just pop the card into a computer or phone or something and save it. Very easy. I especially like the picture in picture mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not easy to navigate im pressing buttons until i get to where i need the instructions are not very clear. But its useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worked great at first. Now it shuts down on its own and wont charge the battery. When its plugged in itll recognize its plugged in but the battery icon wont show charging and will power down. Also doesnt record anymore.
